titles.title: Rest in Me, children of Mine

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rest in Me, children of Mine
And I'll give you peace within,
Rest in Me, and do not strive
If the battle you would win;
Rest in Me, take My yoke,
For the power of sin I broke
At Calvary, to set you free,
So rest in Me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Rest in Me, children of Mine,
You are on the victory side,
Rest in Me, for I will soon
Come again and take My bride;
Rest in Me, persevere
For your redemption draweth near,
Until that day, just watch and pray
And rest in Me.
